amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit the use of funds to implement the DHS rule titled "Public Charge Ground of Inadmissibility.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
